<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no">
    <title>Valentine for Khadija</title>
    <style>
        /* Reset and base styles */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;
            height: 100vh;
            width: 100vw;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff9a9e 0%, #fecfef 50%, #ff6b6b 100%);
            overflow: hidden;
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 20px;
        }

        /* Floating hearts animation */
        .heart {
            position: absolute;
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
            font-size: 24px;
            animation: float 6s linear infinite;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        @keyframes float {
            0% { transform: translateY(100vh) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; }
            100% { transform: translateY(-100px) rotate(360deg); opacity: 0; }
        }

        /* Chat bubble */
        .chat-bubble {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 15px 20px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            font-size: 18px;
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            animation: fadeIn 1s ease-in-out;
        }
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); }
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
        }

        /* Main card */
        .main-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
            backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 30px;
            width: 90%;
            max-width: 350px;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            animation: glow 2s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
        }
        @keyframes glow {
            from { box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); }
            to { box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(255, 105, 180, 0.5); }
        }
        .main-card h2 {
            color: #fff;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            font-size: 20px;
        }
        .qr-code {
            width: 200px;
            height: 200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        .qr-code:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
        }

        /* Bottom buttons */
        .bottom-buttons {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-around;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 300px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        .button {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        .button:hover {
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .button img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
        }

        /* Music toggle */
        .music-toggle {
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        .music-toggle:hover {
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .music-toggle img {
            width: 25px;
            height: 25px;
        }

        /* Popup */
        .popup {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100vw;
            height: 100vh;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            opacity: 0;
            visibility: hidden;
            transition: opacity 0.5s ease, visibility 0.5s ease;
            z-index: 1000;
        }
        .popup.show {
            opacity: 1;
            visibility: visible;
        }
        .popup-content {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 40px;
            text-align: center;
            max-width: 90%;
            box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }
        .popup-content p {
            font-size: 18px;
            color: #333;
            line-height: 1.6;
        }
        .close-btn {
            margin-top: 20px;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            background: #ff6b6b;
            color: #fff;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 10px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 16px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Floating hearts container -->
    <div id="hearts-container"></div>

    <!-- Music toggle -->
    <div class="music-toggle" id="music-toggle">
        <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,
